name: BreastCancerStage0ToIII
title: Breast Cancer Stage 0 to III
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Identifies patients with a breast cancer diagnosis and staging of cancer from 0 to IIIc),(Data Element Scope: Intended to identify the diagnosis of breast cancer),(Inclusion Criteria: Patients with a diagnosed carcinoma of the breast, and breast area with staging criteria 0 to III c),(Exclusion Criteria: Breast cancer stage IV)

concept.display: AJCC Breast Cancer Stage I: T1mic, T1a or T1b (tumor size < 1 cm) documented (ONC)
AJCC Breast Cancer Stage I: T1c (tumor size > 1 cm to 2 cm) documented (ONC)
AJCC Breast Cancer Stage II documented (ONC)
AJCC Breast Cancer Stage III documented (ONC)

contains.display: AJCC Breast Cancer Stage I: T1mic, T1a or T1b (tumor size <= 1 cm) documented (ONC)
AJCC Breast Cancer Stage I: T1c (tumor size > 1 cm to 2 cm) documented (ONC)
AJCC Breast Cancer Stage II documented (ONC)
AJCC Breast Cancer Stage III documented (ONC)
